rugger <- list_rbind(results) |> 
  select(Pos:year, -T) |> 
  mutate(
    PD = PF - PA,
    slam = case_when(
      year %in% c(2002, 2004, 2010, 2022) & name == "France" ~ TRUE,
      year %in% c(2003, 2016) & name == "England" ~ TRUE,
      year %in% c(2005, 2008, 2012, 2019) & name == "Wales" ~ TRUE,
      year %in% c(2009, 2018, 2023) & name == "Ireland" ~ TRUE,
      .default = FALSE
      )
    )
